snippet: Against the backdrop of President Obama’s same-sex marriage endorsement, Mitt Romney faced fallout over allegations that he had once taunted a classmate who later came out as gay.
abstract: Mitt Romney responds to allegations that as a teenager he harassed a prep school classmate who later came out as gay, a day after Pres Obama endorsed gay marriage; Romney apologizes for pranks he may have been responsible for during his high school years, while asserting that he does not remember the specific incident.

byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER  and JODI KANTOR

lead_paragraph: Against the backdrop of President Obama’s same-sex marriage endorsement, Mitt Romney faced fallout over allegations that he had once taunted a classmate who later came out as gay.

headline.seo: Romney Accused of Prep School Bullying
headline.main: Bullying Story Spurs Apology From Romney
headline.print_headline: Bullying Story Spurs Apology From Romney
